Package de.systemagmbh.tools.math

The Systema tools math package provides classes for mathematical and statistical issues.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ISysMathConstants This interface simply stores some mathematical constants.
ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution A ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution is something like a classification for named, countable things.
ISysRealFunction This interface defines the functionality of a mathematic function of one variable R->R.
 

Class Summary
CSysChiSquareDistribution CSysChiSquareDistribution is defined as the probability that the observed chi-square for a correct model should be less than a value.
CSysCompare The class CSysCompare was written to compare float numbers.
CSysExponentialRandom Generates exponential distributed values.
CSysFunction This class is an extension of java.lang.Math.
CSysInterval The class CSysInterval is a wrapper for numeric Intervals.
CSysMathTool The class CSysMathTool is a collection of powerful algorithms dealing with ISysRealFunction real functions.
CSysPropertyDistribution A CSysPropertyDistribution is something like a classiffication for named, countable things It is useful to count named things and visualize: Like bars that have names and height or pie charts that have names and size etc.
CSysRangeArgumentFunction Calculation of the w distribution requires evaluating an infinit integral.
CSysStatistics Some important statistic functions.
CSysStdDeviator The class CSysStdDeviator generates simulated standard distributed values.
CSysWDistributionFunction The w-Distribution is important when calculating the expected values of the range of sample of normally distributed arguments.
 

Exception Summary
CSysMathException Exception thrown by Math classes.
 

Package de.systemagmbh.tools.math Description

The Systema tools math package provides classes for mathematical and statistical issues.
If you migrate from commm.math to tools.math and you miss one of the following classes:

  • CSysGrubbsCriticalValues
  • CSysOutliersCriticalValues
  • CSysPearsonCriticalValues
  • CSysRawDataFilter
These Classes are now part of the product DATAFILTER and have been extended.
